title: The 15 Puzzle: How to Find a Solution in No Time!

steps.title: Place 1 and 2 on their original places.
steps.content: Place 1 and 2 on their original places.

steps.title: Place 4 on the right side of 2.
steps.content: Place 4 on the right side of 2.

steps.title: Make an empty space on the right side of 4.
steps.content: Make an empty space on the right side of 4.

steps.title: Place 5 and 6 on their original places.
steps.content: Place 5 and 6 on their original places.

steps.title: Place 8 on the right side of 6.
steps.content: Place 8 on the right side of 6.

steps.title: Make an empty space on the right side of 8.
steps.content: Make an empty space on the right side of 8.

steps.title: Place 13 on the original place of 9.
steps.content: Place 13 on the original place of 9.

steps.title: Place 9 on the right side of 13.
steps.content: Place 9 on the right side of 13. Move 13 temporarily if you have to.

steps.title: Place 14 on the original place of 10.
steps.content: Place 14 on the original place of 10.

steps.title: Place 10 on the right side of 14.
steps.content: Place 10 on the right side of 14. Move 14 temporarily if you have to.

steps.title: Move around the blocks 11, 12, and 15 to put them to their original places.
steps.content: Move around the blocks 11, 12, and 15 to put them to their original places. If they don't go to their original places, do method 3 again by mixing only the last two rows.
